text: [Music]
[Music]
hi I'm Keyser and I'm a cloud support
engineer here at the aw office in Sydney
sometimes customers asked me how to set
up an email forwarding role in there was
on work mail so let me walk into the
process first sign is another mail
console using their credentials for the
account you want to redirect emails from
then choose a gear icon on the top right
from the left navigation pane select
email roles and then choose new enter a
name for the rule and make sure the
active rule check box is ticked in
conditions select the drop down menu and
then choose a condition you want to
apply for the rule for example you can
choose the rule is only sent to me under
actions choose for the message - and
choose the recipient on the right enter
the email address to which you want to
follow the email to choose ok and then
choose Save Changes thanks for watching
and happy cloud computing from all of us
here at AWS in Sydney
[Music]
you
[Music]
